name: empeopled
overview:
We’ve already built an MVP and have an active beta community using our product.

empeopled is a social platform for groups that uses crowd-voting to determine what the best content is and who the greatest contributors are, topic by topic. This identifies what and who to listen to for both users and advertisers.

Our crowd-voting process uniquely rewards users and aligns their incentives by giving contributors increased influence in their communities - if your peers value you, you get points which lead to your vote getting more weight. This also further improves the content filter for everyone.

In order to maintain a community’s order, fairness, and integrity, we’ve empowered them to govern themselves into the future. They can vote on the rules that govern them and elect ‘Mayors’ to enforce them. This solves many existing community problems while also providing an avenue for dynamic self-realization.

We have three provisional patents around our technology. The first relates to the meritocratic crowd-voting concept. The second relates to a proprietary advertising model based on crowd-voting and the third relates to custom content filtration, by user, based on their activity.
